discussion.author: VEZY
discussion.text: Note: I know the package name breaks the convention set by RegistryCI ("the name is at least 5 characters long"), but this package can be seen as a port of the Python package called [MTG](https://mtg.readthedocs.io/en/latest/), that's why I prefer to keep this name if possible.

discussion.author: VEZY
discussion.text: OK after some discussion I decided to change the name to MultiScaleTreeGraph. Sorry for the inconvenience, I triggered again JuliaRegistrator but it created a new pull request instead of updating this one: #48222. Could you please close this PR ?
